## Reduced Hosting and Operating Costs

Most customers see greater than 50% reduction in licensing and operating costs when switching from enterprise-level CMS platforms to TinaCMS

items.headline: Training & Support
items.text: Get access to the team behind TinaCMS for training, priority support, and custom development.

items.headline: Editorial Workflow
items.text: Empower your team with editorial workflows backed by Git.

items.headline: Single Sign On
items.text: Compatible with the most popular IdPs like Okta and support for both SAML and OIDC.

items.headline: SOC 2 and GDPR
items.text: Actively pursuing SOC 2 certification and GDPR compliance.

items.text: 99.95% server uptime with swift communications if something impacts your sending integration.

items.headline: CI/CD
items.text: Integration with your CI/CD pipeline, pre-prod env VS prod environment.

items.headline: No More Caching
items.text: Reduce the need for caching layers. Isnâ€™t of caching layers, your content is statically generated and distributed through CDN networks.

items.headline: Version Control for your Content
items.text: Developers know how much of a lifesaver Git is, but it's just as big a deal when it comes to website content as well. Screw-ups can be rolled back to earlier commits, meaning you can always go back to a previous version of your site with a few keystrokes.

items.headline: Reduced Hosting and Operating Costs
items.text: Most customers see greater than 50% reduction in licensing and operating costs when switching from enterprise-level CMS platforms to TinaCMS

items.headline: Simplified Development and Maintenance
items.text: Developers become much more efficient when using modern static site frameworks and a headless CMS. Updates and deployments become simpler, reducing the risk of bugs and downtime.

items.headline: Enhanced Security
items.text: Static sites reduce the attack surface by eliminating server-side processing. Static files and strict access controls minimize vulnerabilities, offering a more secure architecture for enterprise organizations. This means that DDOS attacks, scripting hacks, and database exploits are not an issue.

items.headline: Better Performance and Scalability
items.text: There's a reason that a normal static site hosted on a CDN is often 10 times faster time-to-first-byte than a site built with a legacy CMS.  Static architecture delivers fast load times and scalability by pre-rendering pages as static assets and serving them from a CDN, ensuring a seamless user experience even during high traffic periods.
